Articles.Content:
Hello again dear KSP Community, I am here with the second installment of the MSL Vehicles, Take a look!

This is the second installment of Mobile Spacecraft launcher's because of my illness

and coughing are still harassing me, so I decided to upload this file to the internet.

Facts:

128 parts, although many are wheels and struts

5 stages

Holds 1 Kerbal

Completely stock

.17 compatible

History:

In 2012, October 12, Karl SundstrÃƒÂ¶m A.K.A pikmin2faner decided to make a Mobile Spacecraft launcher,

that could have the mobility of a car and being able to make it to the

top of a mountain and launch a spacecraft into space minus the flaws of the ordinary MSL, with seemingly endless funds,

Karl created the MSL 2 MK1.

Instructions:

1. Go where you want to go. (When leaving the runway, be under 2,5 m/s)

2. Let it slow down naturally until at 1 m/s then it's safe to hold the breakes.

3. Disable the jet engine.

4. Raise the wheels. Or let them be

5. Throttle up to at least 70%

6. Stage. The rest handles like a normal ship.
